information: Fruitoni is specialized in the production of nectarines; paraguayan; peaches; pears; Platerinas, apples and apricots, each one for marketing in its time of the year. We produce and export directly from our warehouse located in Massalcoreig (Lleida). Our goal is to take the maximum care of our fruits to guarantee the highest quality to the consumer. Control its journey from the entrance to our facilities to its departure. Serve our customers what they ask us on the date, packaging and agreed quality. The good climatic conditions of the region guarantees the excellent quality of the fruit production of this area in all species. Our fruit normally mature 15 days before the estimated time compared to the other plantations of the community, allowing us to be firsts in the market, always offering the best quality. The daily effort of our team makes of Fruitoni brand a quality product. In our facilities properly adapted for the manipulation of fruit we have been able to adapt to the needs of caliber and packaging that our customers require, always guaranteeing the maximum quality in all our products.
